name: Grossblins
description:
You are the manager of a wacky novelty gift shop in the local mall.  What should've been a peaceful winter's night turns chaotic when mischievous demons called grossblins invade your store. Can you out-prank the grossblins and kill the little bastards? Will you defend your store and your hometown from their rampage? Or will they force feed you edible lingerie until you pass out?

Grossblins is a micro adventure gamebook built in Twine. There are 6 different endings. How successfully you pull off a real life prank will determine your ending! 

Grossblins will soon be published on Adventure Snack, the interactive fiction email newsletter game. Play over 25 free games in the archives, and subscribe to turn your inbox into an adventure.
